document_data.mainbody: '''Clay''' was a common naturally-occurring kind of soil in [[Faer√ªn]] and beyond, often used to make useful and beautiful [[ceramic]] objects.{{Cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2007)/12-22 - Crockery Materials}}
document_data.Description:
[[File:Elemental Clay.png|thumb|200px|''Magically-imbued clay.'']]
Clay resembled thick mud or soft stone depending on how dry it was,{{Cite dragon/13/How Heavy Is My Giant|7}} It was a particularly difficult kind of soil to handle with tools, with even [[hoe]]s and [[plow]]s struggling to break through the stiff and heavy mass.
document_data.Availability: High-quality raw clay for use in magical spells and rituals was available for purchase through the ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 1 [[gold piece]] per {{SIAdj|1|lb|k|long=yes}}. Another variety was available for only 1 [[silver piece]] per pound, as well as {{SIAdj|1|inch|c|long=yes}} fired spheres for 1 [[copper piece]].
document_data.Clay Deposits in the Realms:
* In the [[Abyss]], the cavernous [[Worm Realm]] was made up of earth, stone, and clay.
* In the [[Delimbiyr Vale]], there were rich clay pits along the banks of the [[River Shining]].
* Around [[Corm Orp]].
* The [[Elemental Plane of Earth]] was made up of various minerals, stones, and soils, with clays included.
* The northern reaches of the [[Stonelands]] were largely made up of dry soil unsuited to agriculture.

Usage.Food:
* [[Fensir]] were known to eat some forms of clay.
* [[Magma beast]]s subsisted on clay, among other things.
Usage.Spell Components:
* ''[[Conjure elemental]]'' required a small amount of soft clay if the caster wanted to use it to conjure an [[earth elemental]].
* ''[[Distance distortion]]'' used a small amount of soft clay.
* ''[[Earthquake]]'' used a lump of clay.<ref>
* ''[[Maximilian's earthen grasp]]'' required a miniature hand sculpted from clay.<ref>
* ''[[Move earth]]'' used a bag of clay, loam, and [[sand]] mixed together.
* ''[[Rising colossus]]'' used a ball of clay large enough to fill a caster's hand.<ref>
* ''[[Stone shape]]'' used a piece of clay shaped into the desired form.
* ''[[Transmute rock to mud]]'' used some clay and water.

document_data.Magic:
* ''[[Move earth]]'' could shift a large volume of clay and other soils.
* ''[[Soften earth and stone]]'' turned an area of stone into a soft clay.
